name: Serino - Elenor Rose - Lady
additionalNotes: Serino Cigar Co. is a boutique small batch cigar manufacturer brought to you by the Serino family and world renowned Cuban Master Blender Omar Gonzalez-Aleman. Using the finest source tobaccos and expertly rolled by top-level cigar rollers. Serino Elenor Rose Cigars are an ultra-boutique cigar made in small batches for a cigar club as a private blend. The Elenor Rose is the latest and the best addition to the Serino line to date. Showcasing 7-year old tobaccos from from Ecuador, Jalapa Valley, Esteli and Pennsylvania with a flawlessly aged silky Habano Rosado wrapper. The result is a medium bodied smoke with loads of flavor while being smooth and effortless to smoke. A good core of woody flavors, with undertones of cream, pepper and fruity/floral notes.
